org.jdesktop.jxlayer
Class LayerLayout

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.jxlayer.LayerLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager
public class LayerLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager

The default layout manager for the JXLayer.
It places the glassPane on top of the view component and makes it the same size as JXLayer, it also makes the view component the same size but minus layer's insets

See Also:
JXLayer.getView(), JXLayer.getGlassPane()
